Phys.description: Physical components of the system, including hardware, sensors, and devices.

Network.description: Network components, including routers, switches, and firewalls.

Compute.description: Compute components, including servers, processors, and memory.

Storage.description: Storage components, including disks, tapes, and storage area networks.

App.description: Application components, including software, services, and applications.

Data.description: Data components, including databases, data lakes, and data warehouses.
